第五章：装饰器， ​

装饰器是给代码添加功能 class的继承也是添加功能 装饰器是个非标准的功能（不能直接用）

配置ts装饰器环境 ​

tsconfig.json

tsx
function decorator(target: Function) {}

@decorator
class JC{}
function decorator(target: Function) {}

@decorator
class JC{}

装饰器在类中的使用 ​

装饰器就是一个函数

tsx
// ClassDecorator: 类装饰器
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {

}
function moveDecorator1(target: Function) {

}
// ClassDecorator: 类装饰器
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {

}
function moveDecorator1(target: Function) {

}
tsx
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
    // @moveDecorator放在谁前面， target就是谁；
    target.prototype.getPosition = ():{x: number,y: numb er} => {
        return {x: 100, y: 200}
    }
}
@moveDecorator
class Tank {

}
const t = new Tank()
// console.log(t.getPosition()); t对象上面没有这个方法， 两种方案： 在类中添加方法 | 断言成any
console.log((t as any).getPosition());
console.log((<any>t).getPosition());


@moveDecorator
class Player {

}
const p = new Player()
console.log((p as any).getPosition())
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
    // @moveDecorator放在谁前面， target就是谁；
    target.prototype.getPosition = ():{x: number,y: numb er} => {
        return {x: 100, y: 200}
    }
}
@moveDecorator
class Tank {

}
const t = new Tank()
// console.log(t.getPosition()); t对象上面没有这个方法， 两种方案： 在类中添加方法 | 断言成any
console.log((t as any).getPosition());
console.log((<any>t).getPosition());


@moveDecorator
class Player {

}
const p = new Player()
console.log((p as any).getPosition())

装饰器语法糖 ​

上面讲到的@moveDecorator是个语法糖，真正的表现形式如下：

tsx
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
  // @moveDecorator放在谁前面， target就是谁
  target.prototype.getPosition = ():{x: number,y: number} => {
    return {x: 100, y: 200}
  }
}
// @moveDecorator
class Tank {

}
moveDecorator(Tank);  //等于@moveDecorator
const t = new Tank()
// console.log(t.getPosition()); t对象上面没有这个方法， 两种方案： 在类中添加方法 | 断言成any
console.log((t as any).getPosition());
console.log((<any>t).getPosition());
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
  // @moveDecorator放在谁前面， target就是谁
  target.prototype.getPosition = ():{x: number,y: number} => {
    return {x: 100, y: 200}
  }
}
// @moveDecorator
class Tank {

}
moveDecorator(Tank);  //等于@moveDecorator
const t = new Tank()
// console.log(t.getPosition()); t对象上面没有这个方法， 两种方案： 在类中添加方法 | 断言成any
console.log((t as any).getPosition());
console.log((<any>t).getPosition());

装饰器叠加 ​

哪个装饰器在前面， 先执行谁

tsx
// 装饰器的叠加
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
    // @moveDecorator放在谁前面， target就是谁
    target.prototype.getPosition = ():{x: number,y: number} => {
        return {x: 100, y: 200}
    }
}
const musicDecorator: ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
    target.prototype.playMusic = ():string => {
        return '播放音乐'
    }
}
@moveDecorator
@musicDecorator
class Tank {

}
const t = new Tank()
console.log((t as any).getPosition());
console.log((t as any).playMusic());
// 装饰器的叠加
const moveDecorator:ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
    // @moveDecorator放在谁前面， target就是谁
    target.prototype.getPosition = ():{x: number,y: number} => {
        return {x: 100, y: 200}
    }
}
const musicDecorator: ClassDecorator = (target: Function) => {
    target.prototype.playMusic = ():string => {
        return '播放音乐'
    }
}
@moveDecorator
@musicDecorator
class Tank {

}
const t = new Tank()
console.log((t as any).getPosition());
console.log((t as any).playMusic());

示例-统一消息响应 ​

tsx
const MessageDecorator: ClassDecorator = (target:Function) => {
    target.prototype.message =(content:string): void => {
        console.log(content);
    }
}

@MessageDecorator
class LoginController{
    public login() {
        console.log('登录处理逻辑');
        this.message('登录成功信息')
    }
}

new LoginController().login()

@MessageDecorator
class ArticleController {
    public store() {
        this.message('文章添加成功')
    }
}
new ArticleController().store()
const MessageDecorator: ClassDecorator = (target:Function) => {
    target.prototype.message =(content:string): void => {
        console.log(content);
    }
}

@MessageDecorator
class LoginController{
    public login() {
        console.log('登录处理逻辑');
        this.message('登录成功信息')
    }
}

new LoginController().login()

@MessageDecorator
class ArticleController {
    public store() {
        this.message('文章添加成功')
    }
}
new ArticleController().store()

装饰器工厂 ​

根据需要返回不同的装饰器

tsx
const MusicDecoratorFactory = (type: string):ClassDecorator => {
    switch(type) {
        case 'Tank':
            return (target: Function) => {
                target.prototype.playMusic = (): void => {
                    console.log('播放战争音乐');
                }
            };
        case 'Player':
            return (target:Function) => {
                target.prototype.playMusic = (): void => {
                    console.log('播放喜羊羊音乐');
                }
            };
        default:+
            return (target:Function) => {
            target.prototype.playMusic = (): void => {
                console.log('播放熊出没音乐');
            }
        };
    }
}

@MusicDecoratorFactory('Tank')
class Tank {}
const t = new Tank();
(<any>t).playMusic();

@MusicDecoratorFactory('Player')
class Player {}
const p = new Player();
(<any>p).playMusic()
const MusicDecoratorFactory = (type: string):ClassDecorator => {
    switch(type) {
        case 'Tank':
            return (target: Function) => {
                target.prototype.playMusic = (): void => {
                    console.log('播放战争音乐');
                }
            };
        case 'Player':
            return (target:Function) => {
                target.prototype.playMusic = (): void => {
                    console.log('播放喜羊羊音乐');
                }
            };
        default:+
            return (target:Function) => {
            target.prototype.playMusic = (): void => {
                console.log('播放熊出没音乐');
            }
        };
    }
}

@MusicDecoratorFactory('Tank')
class Tank {}
const t = new Tank();
(<any>t).playMusic();

@MusicDecoratorFactory('Player')
class Player {}
const p = new Player();
(<any>p).playMusic()

装饰器在方法中的使用 ​

@decorator放在类前面就是类装饰器，放在方法前面就是方法装饰器

tsx
const showDecorator:MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol,
descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
    // target: 如果装饰器的对象是静态方法，target就是构造函数，如果是普通方法就是原型对象
    // propertyKey: 方法名
    // descriptor: 方法的描述
    target.name = '九辞'; // 证明target当前是个原型对象
    console.log(descriptor); // value就是方法的函数体
    descriptor.value = () => {
        console.log('我是jiuci');
    }
 }
class User{
    @showDecorator
    public show() {
        console.log('我是九辞');
    }
}
new User().show()
const showDecorator:MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol,
descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
    // target: 如果装饰器的对象是静态方法，target就是构造函数，如果是普通方法就是原型对象
    // propertyKey: 方法名
    // descriptor: 方法的描述
    target.name = '九辞'; // 证明target当前是个原型对象
    console.log(descriptor); // value就是方法的函数体
    descriptor.value = () => {
        console.log('我是jiuci');
    }
 }
class User{
    @showDecorator
    public show() {
        console.log('我是九辞');
    }
}
new User().show()

三个参数： target , propertyKey, descriptor target:

  • 当装饰器装饰的是普通方法的时候， target就是原型对象。
  • 当装饰器装饰的静态方法的时候， target就是构造函数

propertyKey: 方法名称 descriptor: 方法的描述符，改变描述符，就等于改变这个方法

静态方法装饰器和writable ​

tsx
const staticShowDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey:string | symbol,descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
  console.log(target);//构造器
  console.log(descriptor);
  descriptor.value = () => {
      console.log('我是jiuci');
  }
  descriptor.writable = false
}
class User{
  @staticShowDecorator
  public static show() {
      console.log('我是九辞');
  }
}
// 方法描述符中的writable设置为false， 方法不能修改， 所以报错
User.show = () => {
  console.log('jiuci.com');
}
User.show()
const staticShowDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey:string | symbol,descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
  console.log(target);//构造器
  console.log(descriptor);
  descriptor.value = () => {
      console.log('我是jiuci');
  }
  descriptor.writable = false
}
class User{
  @staticShowDecorator
  public static show() {
      console.log('我是九辞');
  }
}
// 方法描述符中的writable设置为false， 方法不能修改， 所以报错
User.show = () => {
  console.log('jiuci.com');
}
User.show()

示例-通过方法装饰器实现文本高亮 ​

tsx
const highlightDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey:string | symbol,descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = ():string => {
        return `<div style="color: red">${method()}</div>`
    }
}

class User{
    @highlightDecorator
    public response() {
      return 'jiuci.com'
    }
}
document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend',new User().response())
const highlightDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey:string | symbol,descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = ():string => {
        return `<div style="color: red">${method()}</div>`
    }
}

class User{
    @highlightDecorator
    public response() {
      return 'jiuci.com'
    }
}
document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend',new User().response())

延迟执行在装饰器中的实现 ​

tsx
const SleepDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey:string | symbol,descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = () => {
        setTimeout(()=> {
            method()
        },2000)
    }
}

class User{
    @SleepDecorator
    public response() {
        console.log('jiuci.com');
    }
}

new User().response()
const SleepDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey:string | symbol,descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = () => {
        setTimeout(()=> {
            method()
        },2000)
    }
}

class User{
    @SleepDecorator
    public response() {
        console.log('jiuci.com');
    }
}

new User().response()

装饰器工厂控制装饰器延迟时间 ​

tsx
const SleepDecoratorFactory = (times:number): MethodDecorator =>
     (...args: any[]) => {
        const [,,descriptor] = args;// 数组的解构
        const method = descriptor.value
        descriptor.value = () => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                method()
            }, times)
        }
    }

class User{
    @SleepDecoratorFactory(200)
    public response() {
        console.log('jiuci.com');
    }
}

new User().response()
const SleepDecoratorFactory = (times:number): MethodDecorator =>
     (...args: any[]) => {
        const [,,descriptor] = args;// 数组的解构
        const method = descriptor.value
        descriptor.value = () => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                method()
            }, times)
        }
    }

class User{
    @SleepDecoratorFactory(200)
    public response() {
        console.log('jiuci.com');
    }
}

new User().response()

装饰器全局异常处理 ​

将抛出的异常统一进行管理 将抛出的异常在装饰器中进行try...catch

tsx
const ErrorDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = () => {
        try {
            method()
        }catch (error: any) {
            console.log(`%c${error.message}`,'color: red; font-size: 20px;')
        }
    }
}

class User {
    @ErrorDecorator
    find() {
        throw new Error('当前的用户查找不到')
    }
    @ErrorDecorator
    create() {
        throw new Error('创建用户失败')
    }
}

new User().find()
new User().create()
const ErrorDecorator: MethodDecorator = 
  (target: Object,propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = () => {
        try {
            method()
        }catch (error: any) {
            console.log(`%c${error.message}`,'color: red; font-size: 20px;')
        }
    }
}

class User {
    @ErrorDecorator
    find() {
        throw new Error('当前的用户查找不到')
    }
    @ErrorDecorator
    create() {
        throw new Error('创建用户失败')
    }
}

new User().find()
new User().create()

装饰器工厂自定义console ​

tsx
const ErrorDecoratorFactory = 
  (color:string = 'red', fontSize: number = 20): MethodDecorator => {
    return (target: Object,propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
        const method = descriptor.value
        descriptor.value = () => {
            try {
                method()
            }catch (error: any) {
                console.log(`%c${error.message}`,`color: ${color}; font-size: ${fontSize}px;`)
            }
        }
    }
}

class User {
    @ErrorDecoratorFactory('green',22)
    find() {
        throw new Error('当前的用户查找不到')
    }
    @ErrorDecoratorFactory('pink',18)
    create() {
        throw new Error('创建用户失败')
    }
}

new User().find()
new User().create()
const ErrorDecoratorFactory = 
  (color:string = 'red', fontSize: number = 20): MethodDecorator => {
    return (target: Object,propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
        const method = descriptor.value
        descriptor.value = () => {
            try {
                method()
            }catch (error: any) {
                console.log(`%c${error.message}`,`color: ${color}; font-size: ${fontSize}px;`)
            }
        }
    }
}

class User {
    @ErrorDecoratorFactory('green',22)
    find() {
        throw new Error('当前的用户查找不到')
    }
    @ErrorDecoratorFactory('pink',18)
    create() {
        throw new Error('创建用户失败')
    }
}

new User().find()
new User().create()

装饰器模拟登录验证 ​

tsx
type user = {name: string,isLogin: boolean}
    const user:user = {
        name: '九辞',
        isLogin: false
    }
    const AccessDecorator: MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
        const method = descriptor.value
        descriptor.value = () => {
            if(user.isLogin) {
                method()
            }else {
                alert('请登录之后再来操作')
                location.href = '15-login.html'
            }
        }
    }
    class Article {
        show() {
            console.log('显示文章')
        }
        @AccessDecorator
        store() {
            console.log('保存文章');
        }
    }
    // new Article().show()
    new Article().store()
type user = {name: string,isLogin: boolean}
    const user:user = {
        name: '九辞',
        isLogin: false
    }
    const AccessDecorator: MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
        const method = descriptor.value
        descriptor.value = () => {
            if(user.isLogin) {
                method()
            }else {
                alert('请登录之后再来操作')
                location.href = '15-login.html'
            }
        }
    }
    class Article {
        show() {
            console.log('显示文章')
        }
        @AccessDecorator
        store() {
            console.log('保存文章');
        }
    }
    // new Article().show()
    new Article().store()

装饰器对权限进行验证 ​

tsx
type user = {name: string,isLogin: boolean,permission: string[]}
const user:user = {
    name: '九辞',
    isLogin: true,
    permission: ['store','manage','update']
}
const AccessDecorator = (keys: string[]): MethodDecorator => {
    return (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
        const validate = () =>
          keys.every(k => {
               return  user.permission.includes(k)
          })

        descriptor.value = () => {
            if (user.isLogin && validate()) {
                alert('验证通过')
                return
            }
             alert('验证失败')
        }
    }
};
class Article {
    show() {
        console.log('显示文章')
    }
    @AccessDecorator(['delete'])
    store() {
        console.log('保存文章');
    }
}
// new Article().show()
new Article().store()
type user = {name: string,isLogin: boolean,permission: string[]}
const user:user = {
    name: '九辞',
    isLogin: true,
    permission: ['store','manage','update']
}
const AccessDecorator = (keys: string[]): MethodDecorator => {
    return (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
        const validate = () =>
          keys.every(k => {
               return  user.permission.includes(k)
          })

        descriptor.value = () => {
            if (user.isLogin && validate()) {
                alert('验证通过')
                return
            }
             alert('验证失败')
        }
    }
};
class Article {
    show() {
        console.log('显示文章')
    }
    @AccessDecorator(['delete'])
    store() {
        console.log('保存文章');
    }
}
// new Article().show()
new Article().store()

装饰器模拟异步请求 ​

tsx
const RequestDecorator = (url: string): MethodDecorator => {
    return (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor) => {
      const method = descriptor.value
      // axios, fetch, AJAX
      new Promise<any[]>(resolve=> {
        setTimeout(() => {
          resolve([{name: 'jicu',age: 18}, {name: '九辞',age: 20}])
        },2000)
      }).then(res => {
        method(res)
      })
    }
  }
  class User {
    @RequestDecorator('https://baidu.com/api')
    public request(user?: any[]) {
      console.log(user);
    }
  }
const RequestDecorator = (url: string): MethodDecorator => {
    return (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor) => {
      const method = descriptor.value
      // axios, fetch, AJAX
      new Promise<any[]>(resolve=> {
        setTimeout(() => {
          resolve([{name: 'jicu',age: 18}, {name: '九辞',age: 20}])
        },2000)
      }).then(res => {
        method(res)
      })
    }
  }
  class User {
    @RequestDecorator('https://baidu.com/api')
    public request(user?: any[]) {
      console.log(user);
    }
  }

属性装饰器和参数装饰器 ​

属性装饰器 - 两个参数 ： PropertyDecorator target:

  • 属性是静态属性的话，是构造函数
  • 如果是普通属性的话，是原型对象

propertyKey: 属性的名称 参数装饰器 - 三个参数 ParameterDecorator target: propertyKey： 方法的名称 parameterIndex: 参数的位置

tsx
const PropertyDecorator: PropertyDecorator = 
  (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol) => {}

const ParamsDecorator: ParameterDecorator = 
  (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) => {}

class JC {
  @PropertyDecorator
  public static title: string | undefined

  public show(id: number = 1, @ParamsDecorator content: string) {}
}
const PropertyDecorator: PropertyDecorator = 
  (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol) => {}

const ParamsDecorator: ParameterDecorator = 
  (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) => {}

class JC {
  @PropertyDecorator
  public static title: string | undefined

  public show(id: number = 1, @ParamsDecorator content: string) {}
}

属性装饰器动态的转换对象属性 ​

示例： 当给属性设置值的时候，希望给属性全部设置成小写

tsx
const LowerDecorator: PropertyDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol) => {
    let value:string = '九辞'
    Object.defineProperty(target, propertyKey, {
      get: (): string => {
        return value
      },
      set: (v:string)=> {
        value = v.toLowerCase()
      }
    })
  }
  class User {
    @LowerDecorator
    public title: string | undefined
  }

  const obj = new User()
  obj.title = 'JIUCI.com'
  console.log(obj.title);
const LowerDecorator: PropertyDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol) => {
    let value:string = '九辞'
    Object.defineProperty(target, propertyKey, {
      get: (): string => {
        return value
      },
      set: (v:string)=> {
        value = v.toLowerCase()
      }
    })
  }
  class User {
    @LowerDecorator
    public title: string | undefined
  }

  const obj = new User()
  obj.title = 'JIUCI.com'
  console.log(obj.title);

使用属性装饰器创建随机色块 ​

tsx
const RandomColorDecorator: PropertyDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol) => {
    const randomColor:string[] = ['red','blue','cyan','##00f0f0']
    Object.defineProperty(target,propertyKey, {
      get() {
        return randomColor[Math.floor(Math.random() * randomColor.length)]
      },
      set(v: string) {
        randomColor.push(v)
      }
    })
  }
  class Color {
    @RandomColorDecorator
    public color: string | undefined
    public draw() {
      document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend',`<div style="width: 200px; height: 200px; font-size: 20px; background-color: ${this.color}">九辞</div>`)
    }
  }

  const color = new Color()
  color.color = '##fff000'
const RandomColorDecorator: PropertyDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol) => {
    const randomColor:string[] = ['red','blue','cyan','##00f0f0']
    Object.defineProperty(target,propertyKey, {
      get() {
        return randomColor[Math.floor(Math.random() * randomColor.length)]
      },
      set(v: string) {
        randomColor.push(v)
      }
    })
  }
  class Color {
    @RandomColorDecorator
    public color: string | undefined
    public draw() {
      document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend',`<div style="width: 200px; height: 200px; font-size: 20px; background-color: ${this.color}">九辞</div>`)
    }
  }

  const color = new Color()
  color.color = '##fff000'

元数据 reflect-metadata ​

元数据：数据的数据，可以给数据进行一些描述 默认情况下是不支持的，需要安装一下： refect-metadata 语法：

tsx
import 'reflect-metadata'
let jc = {
  name: 'jiuci'
}

// 定义元数据
Reflect.defineMetadata('lm',{url: 'jiuci.com'},jc,'name')
// 获取元数据
console.log(Reflect.getMetadata('lm', jc, 'name'));
import 'reflect-metadata'
let jc = {
  name: 'jiuci'
}

// 定义元数据
Reflect.defineMetadata('lm',{url: 'jiuci.com'},jc,'name')
// 获取元数据
console.log(Reflect.getMetadata('lm', jc, 'name'));
tsx
function defineMetadata(metadataKey: any, metadataValue: any, target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol): void;
function defineMetadata(metadataKey: any, metadataValue: any, target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol): void;
tsx
function getMetadata(metadataKey: any, target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol): any;
function getMetadata(metadataKey: any, target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol): any;

使用元数据进行验证数据 ​

完成参数的验证 场景：网络数据作为参数传递给方法，有时候这个参数可能是undefined, 我们不希望undefined的参数进入函数，直接抛出异常

tsx
import 'reflect-metadata'
  // 需求： 对参数的传递个数需要进行验证
  const RequiredDecorator: ParameterDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) => {
    // 将需要进行验证的参数存储元数据
    const requiredParams: number[] = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || []
    requiredParams.push(parameterIndex)
    Reflect.defineMetadata('required',requiredParams,target,propertyKey)
  }
  const ValidateDecorator: MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = function() {
      console.log(Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || []);
    }
  }
  class User {
    @ValidateDecorator
    public find(name:string, @RequiredDecorator id: number) {
      console.log(id);
    }
  }
import 'reflect-metadata'
  // 需求： 对参数的传递个数需要进行验证
  const RequiredDecorator: ParameterDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) => {
    // 将需要进行验证的参数存储元数据
    const requiredParams: number[] = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || []
    requiredParams.push(parameterIndex)
    Reflect.defineMetadata('required',requiredParams,target,propertyKey)
  }
  const ValidateDecorator: MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
    const method = descriptor.value
    descriptor.value = function() {
      console.log(Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || []);
    }
  }
  class User {
    @ValidateDecorator
    public find(name:string, @RequiredDecorator id: number) {
      console.log(id);
    }
  }

参数装饰器完成验证 ​

完成参数的验证

tsx
import 'reflect-metadata'
const RequiredDecorator: ParameterDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) => {
  // 将需要传递的参数存储为元数据
  const requiredParams: number[] = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || []
  requiredParams.push(parameterIndex)
  Reflect.defineMetadata('required',requiredParams,target,propertyKey)
}
const ValidateDecorator: MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
  const method = descriptor.value
  descriptor.value = function() {
    const requiredParams:number[] = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || [];
    requiredParams.forEach(index => {
      if (index > arguments.length || arguments[index] === undefined) {
        throw new Error('请传递必要的参数')
      }
    })
    return method.apply(this,arguments)
  }
}
class User {
  @ValidateDecorator
  public find(name:string, @RequiredDecorator id: number) {
    console.log(id);
  }
}

new User().find('jiuci',1234)
import 'reflect-metadata'
const RequiredDecorator: ParameterDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) => {
  // 将需要传递的参数存储为元数据
  const requiredParams: number[] = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || []
  requiredParams.push(parameterIndex)
  Reflect.defineMetadata('required',requiredParams,target,propertyKey)
}
const ValidateDecorator: MethodDecorator = (target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, descriptor:PropertyDescriptor ) => {
  const method = descriptor.value
  descriptor.value = function() {
    const requiredParams:number[] = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target, propertyKey) || [];
    requiredParams.forEach(index => {
      if (index > arguments.length || arguments[index] === undefined) {
        throw new Error('请传递必要的参数')
      }
    })
    return method.apply(this,arguments)
  }
}
class User {
  @ValidateDecorator
  public find(name:string, @RequiredDecorator id: number) {
    console.log(id);
  }
}

new User().find('jiuci',1234)
